attachments.text: San Francisco artist and collage genius Rex Ray passed away earlier today at age 58 after a prolonged battle with cancer. Gallery 16, which represented Ray (and where I first discovered his…

text: Anyone here interested in designing a simple Uncorked html email signature we can all use?
talk to <@U0265G76F> as we have discussed this before. Can't remember who we talked to about this..
Whoever designs this I'm happy to help translating that design into an HTML email.
Awesome <@U02618EV1> ! I've never been impressed with an email signature. With as many emails as <@U026NB2U2> and I send, I feel like we're missing a glorious opportunity :wink:
*I should've added "if needed." Sometimes it's as easy as just adding a gif.
Does anyone else have issues with PS only displaying black on their artboard when working with the program on an external monitor? I always thought it was my old machine but it still does it for me.
or wait, did you change the color theme?
I cycled through with F and eventually it displayed... now it works. That's weird.
I tried F and TAB with no luck. Usually I just restart PS and everything works great.
Yeah I've had success before with restarting but that sucks.
F is working for me when I'm actively on the external, but when I click my laptop screen then go back to the external, everything blacks out again. No file. Just black. Ugh
Are you using you new laptop? I think it's the retina screen confusing PS.
Maybe, but this was the same on the old 2011 macbook I used to use.
